title: "pixelsurgeon" logo
content:
![pixelsurgeon](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22254.gif)   
   
After you have answered this question go to your nearest pub and pour yourself a beer from the pump whilst the barmaid isn't looking.
author: chooonz

comments.content: There's definitely some riffage on [Pump](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pump-2/pump-medium/testdrive.html?s=pixelsurgeon&p=60) and [Blippo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/blippo/black/testdrive.html?s=pixelsurgeon&p=60)

Lots more similars listed [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/14336.html). However, knowing the pixelsurgeon folks, it's probably a custom geometric linear one-off.

Cheers geezers. I was aware of these fonts already and it was also my suspicion that it would be a custon font. However, I still hold out hope that I can get that particular font from somewhere. I think you should all pour yourselves a beer anyway. And together we'll crack it.
Shouldn't be too hard to ask the Pixelsurgeon folks themselves what it is.

I ( also ) think the type is custom, and has been created by Jason Arber ( of Pixelsurgeon )..   
 [www.arbernaut.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/www.arbernaut.com/) | [www.pixelsurgeon.com/sites/arbernaut/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/www.pixelsurgeon.com/sites/arbernaut/)   
   
Some of his ( aka ' Phonts Typographics' ) / the Pixelsurgeon Fonts are / may be   
available from AtomicType..   
 [www.atomictype.co.uk/phonts\_page.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/www.atomictype.co.uk/phonts_page.html)   
 [web.archive.org/web/20030404012158/http://www.pixelsurgeon.com/pages/fonts/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409/http:/web.archive.org/web/20030404012158/http:/www.pixelsurgeon.com/pages/fonts/index.html)

Thanks. I did send them an email, which wasn't replied to, hence my questions here on this forum ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
I would imagine that they wouldn't be too happy about someone using the same font as them. They seem quite interested in building their own brand.

Thanks. I did send them an email, which wasn't replied to, hence my questions here on this forum ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
I would imagine that they wouldn't be too happy about someone using the same font as them. They seem quite interested in building their own brand.

Hmmm the title for this topic has been changed from "free beer for whoever can answer this question!!" Shame ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)
